personal.preferred_title: Senior Data Engineer | Capacity Planning & AI-Driven Infrastructure Optimization
personal.address: Murphy, TX (Plano area) / 424 Oriole Dr., Murphy, TX 75094

summary: Senior Data Engineer with over 20 years of enterprise experience, specializing in designing scalable data pipelines and automation solutions for high-performance platforms. Proficient in Python programming, SQL expertise, and big data technologies like Apache Spark and PySpark, with extensive experience in data warehousing, ETL processes, and cloud services such as AWS and Azure. Skilled in creating executive reporting tools and dashboards using modern BI tools, ensuring compliance and governance in data analytics environments. Adept at driving innovation through CI/CD pipelines and automation frameworks, with a focus on platform health monitoring. Passionate about mentoring teams and collaborating cross-functionally to deliver data-driven insights. Eager to contribute to Geico’s mission of building cutting-edge data analytics solutions within the Data Analytics and Vertical Engineering team.

flagship_projects.name: Serverless Lakehouse Platform (AWS)
flagship_projects.description: Designed a full serverless data platform using S3, Glue, Athena, and Bedrock. Built a Text-to-SQL GenAI agent with Claude 3 Sonnet. Resolved small file issues using Snappy and Parquet compression. Optimized ETL and data access for enterprise scale.

flagship_projects.name: HorizonScale — AI Capacity Forecasting Engine
flagship_projects.description: Replaced legacy manual processes with a parallel generator-based pipeline, reducing forecasting cycles by 90%. Developed an interactive Streamlit dashboard for real-time capacity insights and 'High Trust' utilization scores. Created a modern agentic pipeline for banking-scale telemetry. Featured comprehensive documentation and performance benchmarks.

flagship_projects.name: FAST Project
flagship_projects.description: Conducted data mining of user performance metrics to optimize critical money-generating systems.

experience.title: Senior Capacity & Data Engineer
bullets: Architected automated ETL pipelines using Python and Pandas to ingest P95 telemetry from 6,000+ endpoints, replacing manual processes.
Developed ML forecasting models with Prophet and scikit-learn to predict bottlenecks 6 months ahead, enhancing provisioning accuracy.
Designed optimized Oracle schemas for historical data retention, enabling seasonal risk forecasting.
Built unified reporting systems with executive dashboards by integrating disparate data feeds.
Identified underutilized infrastructure through data mining, driving significant cost savings via hardware consolidation.
Automated workflows and reporting using Python scripts to improve operational efficiency.

experience.title: Performance Engineer
bullets: Managed Dynatrace AppMon/Synthetics for critical systems and Brand.com, ensuring performance monitoring.
Led 'FAST' project to data-mine real-user performance metrics, providing optimization recommendations.
Upgraded Dynatrace from 6.5 to 7.0, implemented TLS1.2 security, and supported AWS cloud migration.
Developed dashboards for end-to-end functionality and performance metrics analysis.
Analyzed system bottlenecks and proposed actionable performance improvements.
Integrated Performance Center with Dynatrace for comprehensive monitoring.

experience.title: APM Consultant
bullets: Supported enterprise CA APM, CEM, and ADA for utility systems monitoring.
Managed and supported monitoring solutions including CA APM, CA CEM, and CA ADA.

Resolved bottlenecks in J2EE/.NET environments through detailed analysis.

Collaborated with IT teams to troubleshoot and enhance system performance.

experience.title: Performance Test Engineer

Documented critical metrics including JDBC connections, threads, memory, CPU, and GC.
Installed JMX monitoring, Thread Dumps, and Wily Introscope for performance tracking.

Optimized C++/OCCI transaction processing, reducing hardware footprint by 95% while maintaining sub-second latency.
